com.mesosfer

Class MesosferCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosfer.MesosferCloud

  • public final class MesosferCloud
extends Object
    The MesosferCloud class defines provides methods for interacting with Mesosfer Cloud Functions. A Cloud Function can be called with callFunctionInBackground(String, Map, FunctionCallback) using a FunctionCallback. For example, this sample code calls the "validateGame" Cloud Function and calls processResponse if the call succeeded and handleError if it failed. 

     MesosferCloud.callFunctionInBackground("validateGame", parameters, new FunctionCallback
